timeline.message: Update JUnit version and add flags for parallelization
Update other external JUnit versions, fixed azure-core-test issue, added flag in test run
Update parallelization to be full parallel, updated modules without thread safe tests to use non-parallel
Guard azure-core-test add exports to Java 11+
Disable test parallelization in Search, updated JUnit parameter passing to use new XML node
Add explanations for disabled parallel test runs in certain modules
Update new version numbers since last commit
Add resource locks for tests mutating System.out

timeline.bodyText: This was the invalid import, re-order on save happened.
